Desc.entry: Part of Totley Residents' Association. Holds open days on the second or third weekend in July from 1-5pm. Aims to open 10-15 different types of garden including small-scale, ornamental, vegetable and the Totley Pinfold. Open to the public for a small charge which goes to charity. Some gardens are wheelchair accessible, offer toilet facilities, refreshments and/or plants for sale, please contact for further details.
